challenge.redirect_shortly: This process is automated. You will be redirected to your intended destination shortly.
challenge.are_you_human_host: Are you human? Validation required to access {http_host}
challenge.are_you_human: Are you human? Validation is required to continue
challenge.enter_captcha_host: Please enter the CAPTCHA below to continue to {http_host}:
challenge.enter_captcha: Please enter the CAPTCHA below to continue:
challenge.try_again_later: This website is taking longer than usual to load, you may wish to try again later
challenge.unexpected_error: An unexpected error seems to have occurred, please try again later
challenge.validation_complete: Validation Complete you are now being redirected to your intended destination. Click here if the page does not reload.
challenge.enable_javascript: Browser Validation works best with JavaScript enabled.
challenge.abnormal_activity: Due to abnormal activity we need you to complete the task below to continue

default.refresh_text: Please try to access the site later or click here to refresh the page.
default.unexpected_error: An unexpected occurred while loading this page

error.title: Website Unavailable
error.description: Unfortunately an unexpected error occurred during the loading of this page. We apologise any inconvenience. Please try to access the site later or click here to refresh the page.

suspended.title: Website Suspended
suspended.description: Unfortunately the Website you are tying to visit is unavailable. We apologise any inconvenience. If you are the owner of this website, please contact support.

backend.title: Server is unavailable
backend.description: The backend server is temporarily unavailable and is hence unable to serve this request. We apologise any inconvenience.

clienttimeout.title: Request Timeout
clienttimeout.description: We are sorry but a timeout while loading this web page. We apologise any inconvenience this may have caused.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.description: You do not have permission access to this page. If this is in error please contact the website administrator.

upstream.title: Server is unavailable
upstream.description: No server is currently online and available to process this request. We apologise any inconvenience.

invalid_configuration.title: Invalid Configuration
invalid_configuration.description: We are unable to serve this request due to configuration error. We apologise any inconvenience.

resource.title: Access Error
resource.description_start: Unfortunately an error occurred during the loading of this page.
cause_list: The backend server is experiencing unexpected load and is unable to process requests at this time
An unexpected error happened on the backend server or in transit

resource_limitrate.title: Access Error
resource_limitrate.description_start: Unfortunately an error occurred during the loading of this page.
cause_list: Your IP address has been detected as flooding the server
The backend server is experiencing unexpected load and is unable to process requests at this time
An unexpected error happened on the backend server or in transit

resource_limitcon.title: Access Error
resource_limitcon.description_start: Unfortunately an error occurred during the loading of this page.
cause_list: Your IP address has an abnormal number of connections to the server
The backend server is experiencing unexpected load and is unable to process requests at this time
An unexpected error happened on the backend server or in transit

ssl-https-http.title: Bad Request
ssl-https-http.description: This website is accessible via HTTPS. You have attempted to connect via HTTP, we will now attempt to redirect you. If you are not redirected, please add https:// to the start of your URL and try again.

timeout.title: Server is unavailable
timeout.description: Sorry but a timeout occurred while loading this page. It is possible that the server is busy and unable to process your request at this time.

unknown_domain.title: Unknown Domain
unknown_domain.description: This domain is not registered to this IP address.

invalid_configuration.title: Invalid Configuration
invalid_configuration.description: Sorry but this service is configured incorrectly. We are not able to process this request.

unsupported_method.title: Unsupported Method
unsupported_method.description: The HTTP method requested is not enabled for this website.

ssl-insecure.title: Insecure Request
ssl-insecure.description: The HTTPS protocol requested is not enabled for this website. Please update your browser.

maintenance.title: Offline for Maintenance
maintenance.description: This website is not available at the moment. The site should be available again shortly.
